descriptions.Big Burger Combo: Classic burger with fries and medium drink - our signature combo meal
descriptions.Double Cheeseburger: Two beef patties with American cheese, pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard
descriptions.Cheeseburger: Single beef patty with American cheese, pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard
descriptions.Hamburger: Simple and classic - beef patty with pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard
descriptions.Crispy Chicken Sandwich: Crispy breaded chicken breast with fresh lettuce and creamy mayo
descriptions.Chicken Nuggets (6 pc): Six pieces of golden crispy chicken nuggets with your choice of dipping sauce
descriptions.Crispy Fish Sandwich: Golden fried fish fillet with tartar sauce and fresh shredded lettuce
descriptions.Fries: Golden crispy french fries - available in small, medium, or large sizes
descriptions.Baked Apple Pie: Warm handheld pie filled with sweet cinnamon apples and flaky crust
